Operation 'get_/records.{format}' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is vague about the search capability. Description lacks critical details about what parameters are available, what the search supports (filtering, faceting, pagination), and what format options are available. AI agents need to understand the breadth of search capabilities and parameter options to use this effectively.

data.current_summary: Run queries against DigitalNZ metadata search service.
data.current_description: This is the main search endpoint allowing queries against the records database.
data.summary_suggestion: Search DigitalNZ records by metadata query
data.description_suggestion: Search the DigitalNZ records database by querying metadata fields. Supports full-text search, field-specific filtering, faceted search, sorting, and pagination. Returns matching records with their complete metadata. Accepts 33 query parameters for advanced filtering and result customization. Results are returned in the specified format (JSON, XML, etc.).
data.reasoning: Original summary is vague about the search capability. Description lacks critical details about what parameters are available, what the search supports (filtering, faceting, pagination), and what format options are available. AI agents need to understand the breadth of search capabilities and parameter options to use this effectively.

message: Operation 'get_/records/{record_id}/more_like_this.{format}' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary uses informal phrasing ('The "More Like This" call') that is not action-oriented. Description lacks clarity about the similarity algorithm, result ranking, use cases, and available parameters. AI agents need to understand the purpose (recommendations/discovery), how similarity is determined, and what parameters control the results to use this operation effectively.

data.current_summary: The "More Like This" call returns similar records to the specified ID.
data.current_description: This feature returns a set of search results that are similar (ie have similar metadata) to a specific record.
data.summary_suggestion: Find records similar to a specified record
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves records with similar metadata to a specified record ID. Uses metadata similarity matching to identify related content. Returns a set of search results ranked by relevance to the source record. Useful for discovering related items, recommendations, or alternative versions of content. Accepts parameters for result limiting and format specification.
data.reasoning: Original summary uses informal phrasing ('The "More Like This" call') that is not action-oriented. Description lacks clarity about the similarity algorithm, result ranking, use cases, and available parameters. AI agents need to understand the purpose (recommendations/discovery), how similarity is determined, and what parameters control the results to use this operation effectively.
